testCase.name: AppController root should be defined
UserService should be defined
UserService create should create a new user with hashed password
UserService create should throw an error if user creation fails
UserService create should throw an error if password hashing fails
UserService findByUsername should return user when found by username
UserService findByUsername should return null when user not found by username
UserService findByUsername should throw an error if database query fails
UserService findByEmail should return user when found by email
UserService findByEmail should return null when user not found by email
UserService findByEmail should throw an error if database query fails
UserService findById should return user when found by id
UserService findById should return null when user not found by id
UserService findById should throw an error if database query fails
PrismaModule should be defined
PrismaModule should provide PrismaService
UserModule should be defined
UserModule should provide UserService
JwtStrategy validate should return user data without password when user exists
JwtStrategy validate should return null when user does not exist
JwtStrategy validate should handle errors from userService
PrismaService should be defined
PrismaService should have $connect and $disconnect methods
PrismaService should call $connect on onModuleInit
PrismaService should call $disconnect on onModuleDestroy
AuthController register should register a new user
AuthController register should throw error if registration fails
AuthController login should login user and return JWT token
AuthController login should throw error if login fails
AuthController getProfile should return user profile
AuthController verifyToken should verify token and return user data
AuthModule Module Configuration should be defined
AuthModule Module Configuration should have AuthController
AuthModule Module Configuration should have AuthService
AuthModule Module Configuration should have JwtService
AuthModule Module Configuration should have JwtStrategy
AuthModule Module Configuration should have JwtAuthGuard
AuthModule Module Configuration should have ConfigService
AuthModule JWT Configuration should configure JWT with correct secret from ConfigService
AuthModule JWT Configuration should configure JWT with correct expiration from ConfigService
AuthModule JWT Configuration should use default expiration when not provided
AuthModule Module Dependencies should configure JwtModule with async registration
AuthModule Module Dependencies should have PassportModule configured
AuthModule Exports should export AuthService
AuthModule Exports should export JwtAuthGuard
AuthModule Integration Tests should create module with all dependencies resolved
AuthModule Integration Tests should handle missing JWT_SECRET gracefully
AuthModule Error Handling should handle ConfigService errors gracefully
UserController getMyProfile should return user profile without password if user exists
UserController getMyProfile should return message if user not found
UserController getProtectedData should return protected data with user and timestamp
AuthService register should successfully register a new user
AuthService register should throw ConflictException when username already exists
AuthService register should throw ConflictException when email already exists
AuthService register should handle errors during user creation
AuthService register should handle errors during JWT signing
AuthService register should handle errors during username check
AuthService register should handle errors during email check
AuthService validateUser should successfully validate user with correct credentials
AuthService validateUser should throw UnauthorizedException when user does not exist
AuthService validateUser should throw UnauthorizedException when password is incorrect
AuthService validateUser should handle errors during user lookup
AuthService validateUser should handle errors during password comparison
AuthService validateUser should validate user with empty password field
AuthService login should successfully generate login response
AuthService login should handle errors during JWT signing in login
AuthService login should work with user object containing extra properties
AuthService login should handle user with null or undefined properties
AuthService login should handle minimal user object
AuthService service initialization should be defined
AuthService service initialization should have userService dependency
AuthService service initialization should have jwtService dependency
